title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
essing, Wyll announced himself the Blade of Frontiers. He is devoted as ever to his cause: protecting Baldur's Gate and the Sword Coast from the many dangers that plague it, and ensuring its people know a safe and prosperous future. With his father's blessing, Wyll announced himself the Blade of Avernus. He is devoted to protecting the Sword Coast from infernal threats by hunting devils, both within the Hells and without.

All other Outcomes:

Wyll died - as heroes often do. Wyll left our party
